news.title: How free electricity helped dig $9 billion dollar hole in Puerto Rico
news.description: How Puerto Rico's power authority dug them into debt

news.title: Chicago energy firm invenergy to provide wind power to Google
news.description: Invenergy, a Chicago-based renewable energy company, will partner with Google to harness wind power to support the tech giant’s data center operations

news.title: Electricity may spark medical treatment
news.description: Scientists worldwide are exploring the potential of devices dubbed electroceuticals to treat conditions from heart failure and asthma to diabetes, incontinence, and arthritis

news.title: Garbage truck hits utility pole, knocking power to nearly 1k San Jose homes
news.description: About 850 homes are without power Thursday evening in East San Jose after a garbage truck struck a utility pole

news.title: Future cities may harvest energy from human footsteps
news.description: Kinetic energy from footsteps can be harvested into other forms of energy like electricity

news.title: Prepare to pay more for electricity in Texas
news.description: The low electricity prices enjoyed by most Texas consumers can’t last forever

news.title: By 2050, utilities will no longer charge for electricity
news.description: By the year 2050, electricity generating industries will no longer be charging for electricity

news.title: The way humans get electricity is about to change forever
news.description: The renewable energy boom is here

news.title: Bill Gates: World will deliver clean energy breakthrough within 15 years
news.description: Tech billionaire predicts innovation will deliver the clean energy the world desperately needs, but only if young people, businesses, and governments step up to the plate

news.title: Nuclear Power and Global Warming
news.description: Nuclear power provides low-carbon electricity, though its long-term role in combatting climate change depends on overcoming economic and safety hurdles
